title: BMMI04
description: Product inside the hopper is lower that set level. Reason & Remedy
reasons_remedies: The product level gets low in the hopper
Insert the product into the hopper.
The sensor is not working correctly.
Check the sensor and set it correctly.
? Refer to Chapter "Maintenance" > Section "Setting the Capacitive Sensor."

text_for_embedding:
Error Code BMMI04
Error Code 04
Category: BMMI
Title: BMMI04
Alarm Message: Hopper Low level
Description: Product inside the hopper is lower that set level. Reason & Remedy
Reason & Remedy:
1. The product level gets low in the hopper
2. Insert the product into the hopper.
3. The sensor is not working correctly.
4. Check the sensor and set it correctly.
5. ? Refer to Chapter "Maintenance" > Section "Setting the Capacitive Sensor."
Visual References:
- Base foil Mounting and switch Foil Location
- Base foil Mounting and switch Foil Location
